title: Hoover Multi-Cyclonic Canister Vacuum not picking up on hard
description: Hi Lee: We read your review on Hoover.com, and we think we know what's going on. If you turn off your brush roll when vacuuming on hard floors, it should pick up well without scattering debris. We used some crushed up crackers to illustrate. Let us know i

asset.author: Hoover
asset.hookText: Hi Lee: We read your review on Hoover.com, and we think we know what's going on. If you turn off your brush roll when vacuuming on hard floors, it should pick up well without scattering debris. We used some crushed up crackers to illustrate. Let us know if you need more help!
